basic.description: This course provides a foundation in the teaching and learning of community college mathematics courses including introductory mathematics, introductory algebra, college algebra, trigonometry, calculus, and statistics. Topics include investigations into the conceptual nature of mathematics and applications in the community college mathematics curriculum.
basic.subject: MAE
basic.title: Teaching Community College Mathematics

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: Graduate standing and MAC 2313; or instructor permission.
